title: El crimen de la guardia urbana
overview: On May 4, 2017, the Mossos found a burned car on one of the roads of the Pantano de Foix. Inside the vehicle they located the remains of a burned body. The car belonged to Pedro Rodr√≠guez, an agent of the Barcelona Urban Guard. Officially, he was not listed as missing. The Mossos reconstruct the last hours of his life and began to find inconsistencies in the statements of the people closest to the disappeared person.
